properties.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Western Hampshire; Eastern Hampshire; Eastern Franklin; Western Hampden
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:58PM EST until January 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches.

* WHERE...Western Franklin MA, Eastern Franklin MA, Western
Hampshire MA, Western Hampden MA and Eastern Hampshire MA
Counties.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially Saturday
evening.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may fall at rates of an inch per hour
at times Saturday afternoon and evening. The bulk of the
accumulating snow is Saturday evening.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
